body.name: Hyaluronic Acid Toner for Face, Hydrating Toner for Dry Skin, Pore Shrinker, Face Toner for Anti Aging, Reduces Fine Lines, Restores Elasticity to Skin, Facial Toner for Women All Skin Types
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 59 mins
features: [Hydrating Toner]: Hyaluronic acid toner rehydrates the skin deep, hyaluronic acid essence forms a moisturizing layer and a protective barrier, which helps to moisturize and relieve dryness, tighten pore, repair skin barrier, and improve skin metabolism

[Anti Aging Toner]: Face toner for women anti aging, can delay facial skin aging and aging symptoms, fade facial wrinkles and fine lines, is conducive to improving skin relaxation and sagging, but also can make the skin become more firm and younger.

[Gentle Toner]: Moisturizing toner contains 4 kinds of hyaluronic acid, moisturizing factor, and centella, which can maintain the balance of water and oil on the skin, calming toner prevent dry, rough, peeling or excessive oil on the skin, calm and soothe the skin, promote damaged skin to repair itself, and improve skin dullness

[For All Skin Type]: Essence toner suitable for all types of skin, this pore toner takes care of enlarged pores or excess sebum & oily looking skin. Face toner for dry skin, oily skin, sensitive skin aging skin, has a very good effect.

[How to Use]: After cleansing in the morning and evening, apply proper amount of skincare toner to the face, gently rub, and then apply moisturizing cream, or saturate a cotton pad with an appropriate amount of hyaluronic acid toner and apply hydrating toner to your face and leave it on for about 5 minutes. Long-term use is recommended, and short-term effects vary from person to person.
body.description: Hyaluronic Acid Toner for Face Hydrating toner rehydrates the skin deep, hyaluronic acid essence forms a moisturizing layer and a protective barrier, which helps to moisturize and relieve dryness, tighten pore, repair skin barrier, and improve skin metabolism Face Toner for Women Anti Aging Anti aging toner can delay facial skin aging and aging symptoms, fade facial wrinkles and fine lines, is conducive to improving skin relaxation and sagging, but also can make the skin become more firm and younger. Multiple Moisturizing Factors Moisturizing toner contains 4 kinds of hyaluronic acid, moisturizing factor, and centella, which can maintain the balance of water and oil on the skin, calming toner prevent dry, rough, peeling or excessive oil on the skin, calm and soothe the skin, promote damaged skin to repair itself, and improve skin dullness Package Includes: 1* Hyaluronic Acid Toner
